833.quoteText: Microsoft reserves the right at all times to disclose any information as Microsoft deems necessary to satisfy any applicable law, regulation, legal process or governmental request, or to edit, refuse to post or to remove any information or materials, in whole or in part, in Microsoft's sole discretion.
833.title: No promise to inform of government requests

tosdr.case: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
